alert.note: Alert for Phelps (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 23 at 4:02AM CDT until March 28 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Springfield MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri... Gasconade River at Jerome affecting Phelps County. .Heavy rainfall is expected over the Gasconade Basin tonight and Friday and will likely cause flooding at Jerome. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON TO TUESDAY MORNING... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD WATCH... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Gasconade River at Jerome. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon to Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, back water from the Little Piney Creek begins to affect river stages on the Gasconade river at Jerome. At 25.0 feet, moderate flood stage. Flood waters inundate the lower backyard area of residences near the gage site. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:45 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 3.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 24.5 feet early Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Monday morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
